What is the potential use of a serve currency in Verus?

A serve currency in Verus can be used as one of the reserves in another multi-reserve liquidity basket AMM (Automated Market Maker) token. This allows for more flexibility and potential uses of the serve currency within the Verus ecosystem.

serve currency itself can also be used as one of the reserves in another multi-reserve liquidity basket AMM token on Verus.
👀 Stay tuned for more on this later, or start reading docs.verus.io, or join the Discord to learn.

Where can I learn more about Verus and its features?

You can learn more about Verus and its features by reading the documentation on docs.verus.io, joining the Verus Discord community, or following Verus on Twitter. These resources provide a wealth of information on how to use Verus and its various features.
